import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { storeRemoveProduct, incrementQuantity, decrementQuantity } from '../state/cartSlice' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router' export default function Cart() { const cartProduct = useSelector((state) => state.cart) let [count, setCount] = useState(0); let navigate = useNavigate() let alltotal = 0 let dispatch = useDispatch(); function handleIncrement(productId) { // alert(productId) dispatch(incrementQuantity(productId)); }; function handleDecrement(productId) { dispatch(decrementQuantity(productId)); }; function HandleBuy() { navigate('/registrationform') } return (

Product Details
Price
Quantity
Total
Remove
{ cartProduct.map((eachData) => { let productTotal = eachData.price * eachData.quantity; // Accumulate the product total to the overall total alltotal += productTotal; return (

{eachData.title}

{eachData.price}

) }) }
HandleBuy())} value="Buy Now " class="btn btn-primary" />

) }
